quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt
subject: Empowerment and Belief

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs
subject: Passion in Work

quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs
subject: Living Authentically

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill
subject: Perseverance and Courage

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
subject: Overcoming Doubts

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt
subject: Dreams and Aspirations

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson
subject: Persistence

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis
subject: Endless Possibilities

quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
author: Jordan Belfort
subject: Overcoming Obstacles

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau
subject: Hard Work Pays Off

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson
subject: Self-Belief

quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett
subject: Fearlessness

quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh
subject: Possibility Thinking

quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
author: Zig Ziglar
subject: Positive Attitude

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
author: Vince Lombardi
subject: Determination

quote: It's not about how hard you hit. It's about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.
author: Rocky Balboa
subject: Resilience

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
subject: Self-Discovery

quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers
subject: Living in the Present

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney
subject: Taking Action

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon
subject: Work Ethic

quote: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
author: Steve Jobs
subject: Passion and Vision

quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill
subject: Enthusiasm

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller
subject: Ambition

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats
subject: Initiative

quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson
subject: Hard Work and Luck

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
